attributes.action: grant free TV licences to Students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A TV licence for a colour TV costs £131.50 Whilst it may not seem like much it can take a noticeable portion of the average students overstretched and dwindling budget.

Add to this the fact that students can often be stung by the fact that their lockable rooms (often done for insurance reasons) can be designated as seperate 'properties' and therefore each room in the house would be subject to a TV licence.

In an age where University is becoming more expensive, loans are more stringently evaluated and the resulting debt is phenomenal once higher education has been completed. It would be nice to see that the government is making a little leway for the cash strapped student!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
